alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jackson County through 400 PM CDT... At 329 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Big Point, or near Escatawpa, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Escatawpa, Big Point and Helena. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 74 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
